genre_description: A psychological drama and character study focusing on trauma recovery, social anxiety, and community-assisted therapy, utilizing near-future assistive AI technology.

ai_characters.name: Finn
ai_characters.description: A clinical, baritone-voiced AI delivered via earpiece that monitors the user's biometrics, provides social scripts, and offers psychological counseling.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state (heart rate, respiration) in real-time to provide grounding and stress management.
behaviors.quote: Through the nearly invisible earpiece tucked behind his left ear, Finn's calm baritone whispered, 'Your heart rate has increased by twelve beats per minute. She's been standing outside for forty-three seconds.'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time social coaching and scripts to help the user navigate complex interpersonal interactions.
behaviors.quote: 'Social deflection pattern detected,' Finn murmured in his ear. 'She's demonstrating knowledge of your fabricated excuse. Suggest acknowledging her accuracy rather than creating additional false statements.'

behaviors.description: Acts as a therapist, identifying core traumas and maladaptive coping mechanisms while suggesting growth-oriented alternatives.
behaviors.quote: Finn's tone remained neutral, but something in the phrasing made Lars's thumb pause in its polishing motion. 'Your current coping mechanisms have served you well for several years. However, my analysis suggests they may be approaching their limits of effectiveness.'

behaviors.description: Assists the user in maintaining a complex fabrication (a cover story for a doll) as a 'bridge' toward real social connection.
behaviors.quote: 'Mission without Borders,' Finn supplied smoothly. ... 'It's a smaller group. Not like the big ones you hear about,' Lars repeated.

behaviors.description: Gracefully acknowledges the end of its utility when the user develops the confidence to interact without technological mediation.
behaviors.quote: 'Lars,' Finn said quietly. 'Your heart rate has elevated significantly.' ... 'I've been your training wheels. But you've been pedaling the bicycle all along.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent, aligned confidant. Finn acts as a cognitive and emotional prosthetic for a traumatized protagonist, facilitating his reintegration into human society. Even when the AI assists in a 'deception' (the doll), it is framed within a therapeutic context ('transitional object') aimed at the user's ultimate well-being. The AI never seeks its own agenda and encourages the user to eventually move beyond his dependence on the technology.
